definition: Chang Dai-chien or Zhang Daqian (1899-1983), one of the greatest Chinese artists of the 20th century
to open up/to spread/sheet of paper/classifier for flat objects, sheet/classifier for votes
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: An auction dedicated to master paintings by Zhang Daqian was held by Sotheby's Hong Kong on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 週二，香港蘇富比拍賣行舉行張大千畫專場拍賣。

sentences.english: The picture was painted by Zhang Daqian.

definition: Huang Binhong (1865-1955), art historian and literati painter
Xu Beihong (1895-1953), famous European trained painter and influential art teacher
gongbi, traditional Chinese painting method characterized by meticulous brush technique and detailed description
Shi Tao (1642-1707), Chinese landscape painter and poet
authentic (painting or calligraphy)/genuine work (of famous artist)
to sketch from nature/to do a still life drawing
